Experience

Amazon

Training Specialist & Leadership Coach

As a Training Specialist & Leadership Coach at Amazon, I designed and delivered onboarding programs for new warehouse associates, improving team efficiency by 20%. I conducted real-time performance evaluations, provided feedback, and ensured adherence to safety protocols, fostering a secure and productive work environment.

January 2021 - Present

Cursorocity

Software Engineer Intern

As a Software Engineer Intern at Cursorocity, I developed financial analytics tools using Python, resulting in a 5% increase in the customer base. I also implemented unit testing, reducing bugs by 35%, and optimized database schemas for improved query efficiency and data integrity.

January 2023 - May 2023

PROJECTS

Lawbotics Configuration Tool s

For my capstone project, I built a web-based tool that allows researchers to analyze public opinions on robotics lawmaking. I developed backend APIs using Node.js and Express.js to manage game configurations, including events and upgrades. On the frontend, I used Svelte to create an interactive UI that enables real-time modifications. I also implemented CI/CD automation with GitHub Actions and managed data using JSON-based storage, making it easy to update and retrieve configurations.

Augest 2024 - December 2024
Accessibility Champs

I developed a fully accessible website focused on improving web, mobile, and gaming accessibility. I ensured compliance with WCAG standards, making the site more usable for individuals with disabilities. I optimized keyboard navigation and screen reader compatibility while designing a responsive UI that worked across different devices and assistive technologies. My goal was to create an inclusive digital experience for all users.

June 2023 - December 2023
Serverless Task Manager App

I built a serverless to-do list app that allows users to add, update, and delete tasks efficiently. I used AWS Lambda and API Gateway to handle backend logic, making the system cost-effective and scalable. I stored tasks in DynamoDB to optimize database performance and retrieval speed, and I hosted the frontend as a static site on AWS S3, ensuring fast and reliable access.

December 2024 - January 2025

Interests

I'm passionate about software engineering and cloud computing, with a strong focus on becoming a Cloud Engineer by deepening my expertise in AWS, DevOps, and backend development. I enjoy working with APIs, databases, and system design, optimizing architectures for performance and scalability. My interests also extend to AI and machine learning, particularly their applications in automation and decision-making. Beyond tech, I have an entrepreneurial mindset, having explored business ventures such as Outdoor Movie Rentals, Bikobra (bike sales), and a potential car dealership in Baghdad. I stay committed to continuous learning through online courses, LeetCode practice, and YouTube videos on computer science. Additionally, fitness and health play a crucial role in my lifestyle, as I actively engage in weightlifting and intermittent fasting. My enthusiasm for gaming and UI/UX development is reflected in my work on interactive projects like Lawbotics, while my passion for automobiles fuels my interest in car repairs and dealership operations.
